nodes.text: The Low Altitude Assault Transport/vehicle, or LAAT/v, was a modified LAAT/i gunship manufactured by Rothana Heavy Engineering.

It was specially made to hold up to 16 74-Z speeder bikes, among other means of transportation. It was similar to the LAAT/c, in the sense that they both carried vehicles into battle.
Each LAAT/v had three anti personnel laser cannons and, in some variants, two composite beam laser cannons in the wings.
